text: Alfred Ambler (born 1 July 1879) was an English footballer. His regular position was at half back. He was born in Ardwick, Manchester. He played for Manchester United, Hyde United, and Colne. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1879 births Category:English footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:People from Ardwick Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football defenders
title: Alfred Ambler
